mapper.select: SELECT address,bookingDays,checkInDate,checkOutDate,count,room.hotelId,hotelLevel, hotel.hotelName,hotelorder.id,isHavingBreakfast,linkUserName,payAmount,roomBedTypeId,roomBedTypeName, roomId,room.payType as roomPayType,roomTitle,specialRequirement FROM itrip_hotel hotel, itrip_hotel_order hotelorder,(SELECT itrip_hotel_room.*,name roomBedTypeName FROM itrip_hotel_room,itrip_label_dic WHERE roomBedTypeId = itrip_label_dic.id) room WHERE hotel.id = hotelorder.hotelId AND room.id = hotelorder.roomId AND hotelorder.id = #{hotelId}
mapper.insert: insert into itrip_hotel_order( userId, orderType, orderNo, tradeNo, hotelId, hotelName, roomId, count, bookingDays, checkInDate, checkOutDate, orderStatus, payAmount, payType, noticePhone, noticeEmail, specialRequirement, isNeedInvoice,bookingDays, checkInDate, checkOutDate, orderStatus, payAmount, payType, noticePhone, noticeEmail, specialRequirement, isNeedInvoice, invoiceType, invoiceHead, linkUserName, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy, bookType) values( #{userId}, #{orderType}, #{orderNo}, #{tradeNo}, #{hotelId}, #{hotelName}, #{roomId}, #{count}, #{bookingDays}, #{checkInDate}, #{checkOutDate}, #{orderStatus}, #{payAmount}, #{payType}, #{noticePhone}, #{noticeEmail}, #{specialRequirement}, #{isNeedInvoice}, #{invoiceType}, #{invoiceHead}, #{linkUserName}, #{creationDate}, #{createdBy}, #{modifyDate}, #{modifiedBy})
